verify_device.register_your_device.translation: Please register this device to continue

verify_device.device_registeration_link_.translation: We sent a device registration link to

verify_device.device_one_time_approval.translation: This quick one-time approval will help keep your account secure

verify_device.unmatched_device.translation: Does not match your current browser/device

verify_device.recognize_this_device.translation: I recognize this browser and device

verify_device.rejected_login_text.translation: We've stopped the unrecognized device from accessing your account

verify_device.rejected_login_mistake.translation: Made a mistake? Head back to **{appName}** to restart the login process.

verify_device.go_back_to_finish_login.translation: Go back to **{appName}** to finish logging in

verify_device.close_this_tab.translation: You can now close this tab

verify_device.your_device_link_expired.translation: Your login approval link has expired. Request a new one to continue.

verify_device.send_another_magic_link_to.translation:
Send another magic link to 
**{userEmail}**.
 the link to log in or sign up.
